name: Ismail
aboutInfo: Hi, I'm Doing my Studies at IU International University of Applied Sciences, I completed Seavus academy and got the title full stack Web Development, I've dealt with many different types of technology throughout my life, I'm proficient at dealing with technical issues of all sorts, I have excellent communication skills, I work very well in groups.

aboutSkills: Led the design and implementation of UI components for web applications by leveraging open-source libraries.
Collaborated closely with web developers and backend engineers to orchestrate the development of high-performance, responsive, and interactive web applications using Angular.
Spearheaded the development and maintenance of applications using React, ensuring their continued excellence.
Utilized Figma as a tool for streamlined production of high-quality designs and efficient project planning.
Designed captivating banners and crafted GIFs tailored for effective advertising campaigns.
Proficient in the design and implementation of web application UI components utilizing open-source libraries
